name: Maxun
short_desc: Open-Source No-Code Web Data Extraction Platform
author: Maxun Team
description: Maxun lets you train a robot in 2 minutes and scrape the web on auto-pilot. Web data extraction doesn't get easier than this! Extract data with no-code, handle pagination & scrolling, run robots on schedule, turn websites to APIs and spreadsheets.

form_fields.label: Google Client ID
